function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-compliance due to high costs","Impact":"Risk of lower compliance with measures, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Reduce costs of compliance, provide incentives for compliance, increase awareness of the benefits of compliance","Technologies":"Digital tracking, contact tracing apps, automated monitoring systems","People":"General population, at-risk individuals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Non-compliance due to strain and negative emotions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential spread of contagious diseases, heightened public health risk","Mitigation":"Improve mental health support, provide resources for coping with negative emotions, increase communication and education about the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Telehealth, mental health apps, online support groups","People":"General population, at-risk individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Non-compliance due to deterrent effect of measures","Impact":"Risk of increased non-compliance, potential for individuals to violate rules due to perceived low risk of punishment","Mitigation":"Increase certainty and severity of punishment, improve perceptions of punishment, communicate the consequences of non-compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, data analytics, communication platforms","People":"General population, individuals at risk of non-compliance","Owner":"Law enforcement, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Non-compliance due to lack of capacity to comply","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential for misunderstanding and misinterpretation of measures, reduced effectiveness of mitigation efforts","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accessible information, improve access to resources for compliance, empower individuals with necessary knowledge and tools","Technologies":"Educational apps, online resources, community engagement platforms","People":"General population, individuals with limited resources or capacity to comply","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, educational institutions"}]}
